website_summaries.verdict: Perfect for for smaller homes and apartments. It can easily be positioned against the wall without interfering with its surroundings.
pros: Weighing just 108 pounds, it's very compact and portable
Frame comes with a lifetime warranty
cons: With a 250-pound capacity, the running belt can feel slightly rickety for heavier users, especially while running

customer_reviews.title: I love this treadmill
customer_reviews.text: For the price and size , I love this treadmill. However, the directions recommend oiling the belt prior to using it, but then it’s very difficult to get the belt tightened and realigned properly. Mine always seems to squeak and make noise. Overall the machine is noiser than most, which doesn’t matter too much for me because it’s in a basement. Those that are concerned about that in apartments or small spaces should be aware. The belt is wider than some others, which is more comfortable for running in particular. I am happy that I bought it and value being able to run inside in rainy or snowy days. Would recommend depending on your needs.
customer_reviews.author: Shauna S.

customer_reviews.title: You be the judge
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was a PAIN. The frame had an issue so a lot of the pieces didn't fit together. The company concluded a frame work issue after I showed them pictures but amazon helped me out. Note that I'm not the only one having troubles assembling it. I figured it out and used a different way not stated in the manual to get it together and be 75% stable. In terms of performance, it is very good but the belt keeps shifting to the left side all the way even after I do a belt adjustment but oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: After week one the control board was broken. It was replaced and a couple of months later it was broken again. And, trust me, I do take care of my treadmills: lubricate them, plug them in a dedicated power line, clean them often - I really do everything I have to do to make them last longer. This was really really didn't. Very dissapointed!
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Package was damaged and frame was bent when received. ...
customer_reviews.text: Package was damaged and frame was bent when received. Assembly and operating instructions apparently were lost through the hole in the box. Was able to look up assembly instructions online, it was not complicated, although I had to straighten out the frame in order for it to fold up. The belt slips on anything over 2.5 mph. If not careful it will cause you to fall or stumble when this happens. I'm hoping I can find a remedy online to fix this problem.
customer_reviews.author: if we must

customer_reviews.title: Great treadmill
customer_reviews.text: I shopped a lot, and this treadmill seemed to be the best price. I haven't had any problems with it, and its held up really nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product description is incorrect
customer_reviews.text: While the treadmill is a decent quality and the size is compact enough to fit in tight spaces, the description is not correct with regards to the MPH settings. The treadmill only goes in 0.5 MPH increments, not 0.1. This was not what I expected and is not conducive to my training regimen. Thankfully the treadmill is just a backup for when I can't run outside and I will make do with the inflexible MPH settings. I mean, it was only a few hundred dollars so I really didn't expect that much out of it. Please update the product description to accurately reflect the available settings.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie123

customer_reviews.title: Good product, very weak frame
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this a month ago, but so far so good - with one complaint. The frame is VERY weak, and if you look at it wrong it will bend. I bent the frame removing it from the box, so the vertical support bars are crooked, so I had to rig them to fit the holes in the UI pad. It works well, manual incline is nice. It's a little loud (beeps a lot during startup and shutdown) but a good buy as long as you can get it out of the box without any damage
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: .Walk to health
customer_reviews.text: Love this treadmill. It's not very heavy no very large (18 x 47), but large enough to get your walk on. LED lite panel, the incline is not very high but high enough for me. I'm 60, not planning to run a marathon, won't be running on it but a fast pace walk is good enough for me. I also like that it's origin is USA/Wisconsin.
customer_reviews.author: BrownSugar

customer_reviews.title: I love my new treadmill
customer_reviews.text: I love my new treadmill! This simple inexpensive treadmill which cost less than $400 has strengthened my hips & legs in 2 weeks, its changed my life! My legs & hips were weak & achy before, they feel much stronger now, all the positive reviews are 100% accurate!
customer_reviews.author: Susan H. Lubin

customer_reviews.title: A Great Machine
customer_reviews.text: I was somewhat hesitant due to the low price of this treadmill but that was a needless apprehension. This machine is fabulous. The features greatly exceeded my expectations. My wife has been using it daily also. I might add that I purchased this treadmill to try to help lower my blood pressure and it is doing a fabulous job. This added exercise has lowered my blood pressure by 12 points.
customer_reviews.author: George N. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth It!!!
customer_reviews.text: I did my research on treadmills under $400 and this one was rated high. I bought this for my husband for Christmas, and he has been on it every night since. He is 5 9', about 175 lbs and it is a perfect fit for his running stride. It does take some some time and patience to put together, but, so would any other one that we would of purchased. No particular problem there. This treadmill folds up nicely for added storage. Is light enough and easy to move. Well worth it for the price! We would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Grace

customer_reviews.title: I love this!!
customer_reviews.text: it didn't get damage when i got it, and it function well after I installed . Perfect product with its price. This is the edition for my previous view. After 4-5 years, it stopped working today. I probably will try different treadmill just for experiencing something new brands. But, I recommend for people who are first time buying treadmill to purchase this one. For me, it really worked for around 4-5 years. The reason why this stopped working because of the motor got burnt. It was good anyway...but suddenly stopped working while I was running...Ah.
customer_reviews.author: ChiZejian

customer_reviews.title: I like the Merit Fitness Treadmill.
customer_reviews.text: It went together easily and seems to be a solid treadmill- I ran and walked on it. My only adjustment was that I was used to the treadmills at the gym- I could change the incline by just pushing a button. On this one you can't. Also, the speed goes up by .5 and once again I was used to .1 and could up the speed step by step while warming up. All in all, I like it and it serves it purpose without breaking the bank.
customer_reviews.author: Joanie

customer_reviews.title: Great Treadmill
customer_reviews.text: This was my first home treadmill, so I don't have a lot to compare it to. That said, I love it! It has been reliable and I have lost a total of 60 lbs since I started using it. Assembly was fairly painless. The various settings and speeds are perfect for my needs and I couldn't be happier. A note to iPad owners--there is a lip on the front of the treadmill that allows me to place my iPad there and watch on videos while I'm working out. Overall, I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: P. Smith

customer_reviews.title: terrible condition!
customer_reviews.text: This product was delivered in terrible condition. This was supposed to be a Father's Day gift that I will be unable to give. Not only were there scractches and cracks on the treadmill, but all hardware and accessories were missing. I have pictures on my phone I would be happy to provide. Also the handle bars were missing. The cord coming from the arm does not have the same end as pictured in the manual. I am extremely unhappy with this purchase. Please resolve this as soon as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Merit Fitness 715T plus treadmill
customer_reviews.text: Overall I am pleased at what I got for the price. I did have three disappointments. Had the thing assembled before we found the directions. During the erection processit was most easy to cross thread bolts. I wish the speed increments would be in less than .5 mph
customer_reviews.author: OLDGOLFER

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. Not very difficult to assemble. I wouldn't recommend running on it. Wish the speed levels were a little more gradual. Going from 2.5 speed to 3 seems like a bigger jump than it should be. Great economical first treadmill for someone just starting out.
customer_reviews.author: MamaRedHot

customer_reviews.title: Great but Noisy
customer_reviews.text: I am grateful that I paid for assembly. The only complaint I have to make is that it is noisy. Other than that, it is a great deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie S. Cohen

customer_reviews.title: I contacted Merit Fitness customer service (via email) to express my disappointment in their product and see what options I have
customer_reviews.text: I purchased in December 2013. Averaged 8 miles a week for 14 months when the motor blew up. I checked my warranty and motor is only covered for 12 months. I contacted Merit Fitness customer service (via email) to express my disappointment in their product and see what options I have. 3 days later no response to my inquiry (other than an automated email confirming receipt) and a 100 pound piece of garbage taking up space in my garage. Poor product, poor customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Gillespie

customer_reviews.title: efficient
customer_reviews.text: Good space saving equipment. My only gripe would be that it automatically cuts off after an hour but it can be considered a good safety/energy conservative design plan
customer_reviews.author: T.T.

customer_reviews.title: Good Treadmill Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have been happy with this treadmill. When it arrived, the box was damaged enough for me to be concerned but luckily only the upper left side of the base was scratched. This shouldn't happen but at least it did not affect its performance. I purchased it to use for daily walking exercise and it serves my purpose well. My teenage son also uses it to run. Overall, I would recommend it - especially for the price I paid, which was right under $300.
customer_reviews.author: jules

customer_reviews.title: SENDING BACK FOR A SECOND TIME
customer_reviews.text: I got my replacement of this product today - I had to return the first one. The box on the replacement treadmill was so messed up that I didn't even bother opening it. The last one I got was a little messed up on the outside, but I opened it and started putting it together only to find it was dented and the pieces didn't fit. It took over an hour just to get the original one packed up in the box and put together and then have to drag it out for UPS to pick up to return. The next one that came was worse. I'm giving it one more chance and then I give up.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle Johnson Bullock

customer_reviews.title: but I love it. I am pregnant and can't always make ...
customer_reviews.text: A bit loud, but I love it. I am pregnant and can't always make it outdoors to workout, but considering the cost....it's been wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Wvuchic13707

customer_reviews.title: My treadmill
customer_reviews.text: This is my first treadmill. The price was right. I enjoy walking so when it's raining, extremely hot or very cold outside this is the best. It didn't take long to assemble. I checked out several treadmills and found this to be just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: blondie

customer_reviews.title: Missing peices
customer_reviews.text: I would like to rate it higher but the peices to fully put it together were missing. It is just some bolts so I am going to spend more of my money to buy bolts that should have came with it after all it was new.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: My treadmill arrived in a box that had been damaged in transit, but the contents of the box were just fine. It went together without a problem and works beautifully. I especially like the fact that I can read my Kindle while I walk. The safety "key" is a nice feature, although we don't have to worry about any little kids playing on it for the time being. My daughters use it for jogging, and the tread area is long enough. It fits perfectly in an otherwise wasted space. We're all pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda

customer_reviews.title: Biggest Box EVER
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure how my postman got this monster on my porch, but I managed to get it taken out of the box and assembled by myself in less than an hour. I would recommend you get a helper though. Works perfectly, a lot of functions. Very Happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Hardt

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE MY TREADMIL
customer_reviews.text: BOX WAS A LITTLE BANGED UP, BUT THE TREADMILL WAS STILL IN GREAT SHAPE. MY TREADMILLS TRACK WAS LOOSE AND SKIPPED BAD WHILE I WAS RUNNING AND I THOUGHT I HAD A DUD LIKE A LOT OF THE OTHER REVIEWS... BUT WE TIGHTENED THE BELT AND I'M IN BUSINESS!! ^_^ 5 STARS THROUGH AND THROUGH!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: It's a great machine! Never had any problems with it
customer_reviews.text: I have this treadmill since 2009. I am a runner and I run 35 miles, 5 days a week. It's a great machine! Never had any problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: F. Alves

customer_reviews.title: Works fine but QC is not the greatest
customer_reviews.text: My 715T Plus Treadmill was not terribly difficult to put together and it works. However, there were two flaws when I unpacked it: a) brackets that hold side strip were broken and b) the screw holes for the end cap did not line up. Amazon did provide a $70 refund for the bracket problem but I just discovered the screw hole issue.
customer_reviews.author: Thadyus D. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great beginning machine
customer_reviews.text: Has worked flawlessly and folds up nicely in the corner. Have used every day without a problem. It is great for the winter months.
customer_reviews.author: dt405gt

customer_reviews.title: incredibly frustrating assembly, faulty electric wiring.
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to assemble as many of the screw holes didn't line up. Very frustrating. Made assembling IKEA furniture feel like child's play. After we finally assembled, it didn't turn on. If we turn the wiring just right, it'll turn on for a few moments with a mocking and irritating beeping noise. Tried calling support, but of course they're not open on the weekends. So frustrated and disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: I like the wide and long walking area
customer_reviews.text: I like the wide and long walking area. But I do wish the controls showed BOTH distance and time at the same time. It is quiet enough that I can watch TV while I walk. Very heavy though, I won't be moving it by myself.
customer_reviews.author: Veniece L.

customer_reviews.title: Great for indoor walking
customer_reviews.text: Arrived early and in good shape. Took about an hour to assemble. Works great for being able to walk indoors, no matter what the weather is like. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SuzieQ

customer_reviews.title: Product came damaged
customer_reviews.text: This product came in a box that was literally falling to pieces. In turn, the machine was dented and damaged in several areas. I took pictures of the box and the product for return but went ahead and put it together to see if it would work anyway. At this writing I've used it 3 times and I have no idea whether it will continue to work. I am handicapped in my shoulders so the prospect of getting the equipment 1) to a UPS site and/or 2)repackaging it for UPS to pick it up was daunting. In suma, the product is packaged inadequately for shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Terisa Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Marvelous Merit Fitness Treadmill
customer_reviews.text: This is my first peice of exercise equipment and I am so impressed with this make and model. It fits perfectly in a designated area in the basement and has been easy to assemble, easy to use, and fun!
customer_reviews.author: DrStepD

customer_reviews.title: A great treadmill!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this back in April. So far so good. I haven't had any problems with it. I use it between 4-5 times a week. It's nice to have a treadmill at home, I don't need a gym membership. Now you can't fold it and hide it underneath your bed but it is very sturdy. I use it to walk and run and it works great. I believe it was worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Icejan

customer_reviews.title: Treadmill
customer_reviews.text: Love my treadmill!! Cannot beat the price, doesn't look or work cheaply. So happy to have it in the privacy of my own home so that I can workout in private!! :)
customer_reviews.author: cara

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: I love it!! it does not have all the "cool" gizmos on it as the super expensive ones do but its more of a working persons treadmill,very affordable very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: americanorway

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Ive used it for over 5 years. Heavy use no problems. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: edbusa

customer_reviews.title: Great machine for the price
customer_reviews.text: I give this product 4 stars because it is everything I expected it to be for the price I paid. Shipping was extremely fast for me. I received it the next morning after i ordered it and it was with the Free Super Saver Shipping option. I would have really liked for it to have had the automatic incline but i can deal with the manual incline that it comes with. So far i have no complaints. If you have a small budget to spend on a treadmill i would recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: JessD

customer_reviews.title: As far as the treadmill goes I love it!
customer_reviews.text: As far as the treadmill goes I love it!! Works great!! The only down fall for me is it isn't as compact (space efficient) as what I'd thought it would be with it being folded up. Other than that, great product for a reasonable price!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great basic treadmill
customer_reviews.text: Great basic treadmill for the $$$. Free amazon prime shipping- recieved my order in record time. Great quality. 2 men put together in a cpl hours nothing too difficult. Everything I could ask for in a basic treadmill!!!
customer_reviews.author: deal crazy

customer_reviews.title: My new treadmill. Merit Fitness 715T Plus.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It's more than I expected. Delivery was great. Assembly was a snap. Great decision. Great price. I would recommend this treadmill.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy S.

customer_reviews.title: COPD illness
customer_reviews.text: I am confined to the house because of the cold weather and the affect it has on COPD. At first I 1.5 miles an hour but now up to 2.5 per hour for 20 minute spurts three x a day. This has helped my breathing a lot. The treadmill because of my condition the real slow pace is great. For the price I couldn't have a better medical apperatus
customer_reviews.author: Al Roche

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a few months ago and though I don't use it as often as I thought. It is sturdy, and runs quietly and smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: C and J. DeHaven

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love the treadmill. It has lived up to my expectations. Very please. It took a week before my husband put it together but now I use it constantly.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I received my treadmill on the date it was suppose to arrive. It was a little hard putting two screws in under the two handles and I still hav'nt put the screws in but besides that it is holding up good, when I feel like it I will try to put the two screws in. I am satisfied with my treadmill. It is all of what they say it is.
customer_reviews.author: debra roberson

customer_reviews.title: Merit Fitness 715T plus Treadmill
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in Jan. 25, 2013, it is already broke and I didn't start using it until a month ago. I would not recommend this product too anyone. Also the time that it took to put this piece of junk together. Robert Thompson
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: good tredmill
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried when I got this tredmill because of the bad reviews , but I have had it for one year now with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I was able to assemble the treadmill up ton the last step. Wheb I tried to raise it up to finish, the running board hit the handle. When I called the number given I spoke with a representative and was told to take pictures of the frame. I express mailed the pictures and received a phonecall that the frame was bent and I had to contact Amazon for a replacement or credit. I am still waiting for the specialty packing company to come and pack thre machine for return as I threw away the original packing materials. I will not order this treadmill again. Marian Woodfork
customer_reviews.author: Naturenetics

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good...
customer_reviews.text: I feel that this treadmill is definitely not for heavy-duty usage, but as a walker, I love it. It's quiet. It's light enough for me to maneuver the folding mechanism to clean it as well as move it. It's been very reliable so far. I would recommend it. I will update my review if I have any problems.
customer_reviews.author: yortski

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This treadmill works well and has been reliable without spending a lot.
customer_reviews.author: michael b.

customer_reviews.title: Merit Fitness Treadmill
customer_reviews.text: The Cover on the motor was cracked, we sent back to Amazon, who replaced immediately. The second one arrived and the cover was also cracked. Call manufacturer and they sent out a replacement cover immediately. Awesome customer service by everyone involved! I do love the treadmill....nothing real fancy, but it does the job! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I don't use yet but look nice at my room lol
customer_reviews.author: butros keeib

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The treadmill's base was bent, making it impossible to attach the console and masts.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Hite

customer_reviews.title: The box the trend mill came in was totally destroyed ...
customer_reviews.text: The box the trend mill came in was totally destroyed. Put together was okay but lubricating the belt was a hassle. Cheaply made. I would have returned but box was not repairable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Scratched
customer_reviews.text: My treadmill came damaged. It’s only cosmetic, but it shouldn’t have come with marks.
customer_reviews.author: Jody T.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was pretty easy. The directions were clear, the pieces are a bit cumbersome to deal with. Definitely a two person assembly job. The treadmill is easy to use. My husband and I are both using it on a daily basis.
customer_reviews.author: Leanne Crisp

customer_reviews.title: Unit doesn't work...!,,,
customer_reviews.text: Box was delivered in damaged box. After spending an hour assembling the unit doesn't operate doesn't even light up. No power. I'm going to try to contact seller tomorrow hopefully something can be rectified and I can begin to use this machine.
customer_reviews.author: eri brown

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This was a fairly easy project for this female senior citizen to put together herself. My only suggestion would be to tighten the console masts after the console is in place. Just remember to tighten all the screws after this is complete. Really took no time at all.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Dallara

customer_reviews.title: Excellent treadmill.
customer_reviews.text: Only problem was the product arrived slightly cracked because packaging was poor. Treadmill still is sturdy and works excellently. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: treadmill
customer_reviews.text: Great price and came sooner than I was given. Also light enough that I could move it myself.
customer_reviews.author: Coleen Varesano

customer_reviews.title: no problems
customer_reviews.text: Great for the money. Assembly 45 min. So far is working great. The tread part folds up when not in use. Nice for small amount of space.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Treadmill Use
customer_reviews.text: I like the treadmill but the on/off switch is in a very difficult place to reach. I have to have mine up against a wall and I have to get on my hands and knees to turn it on and off. Since I have a problem with my knees this is very painful.
customer_reviews.author: Reader Addict

customer_reviews.title: Merit Fitness 715T Plus
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy this machine, it's easy to use and folds perfectly in my apartment for more space. It wasn't too hard to put together by myself, I just needed someone to hold the "monitor" portion so I could secure it to the frame. I works great.
customer_reviews.author: ChrissyinSC

customer_reviews.title: 715T Plus Treadmill
customer_reviews.text: I needed a good treadmill to finally start loosing the wieght my doctor has been on me to get rid of for years. Very staisfied with the speed of delivery. Ordered it on October 27 and it was here November 1st! I've been on it every day since and I believe I'll need it for a long, long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend it to anyone!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item as a gift for my daughter. She received the treadmill on January 20, 2011, put it together yesterday, used it once, and it doesn't work. The walking belt does not stay in place, it keeps shifting to the right and it's fraying the belt. She readjusts the belt and it just keeps coming off. I tried to contact the company, Horizon Fitness, and due to a high volume of calls (not good), they can not take the call. They recommended me to send an email to the company. I sent an email, and I still have not heard back from them. What a hunk of junk!!!
customer_reviews.author: debjano

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived with two bolts rusted one bolt completely smooth not cut. Console too wide to fit on base.
customer_reviews.author: Ebony L.

customer_reviews.title: Great once you put it together
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are easy and the packaging of the screw sets makes it simple, but don't expect every bolt to thread in perfectly. My only gripe is the bolts not all threading properly, and the allen-wrench tool that's provided is a pain. If you have an electric screwdriver and the right bits, save your forearms and use them instead of what's provided. Other than that, I assembled it, plugged it in, turned it on and ran a half mile to test and it worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: sprfrk8724

customer_reviews.title: Merit Treadmill.
customer_reviews.text: My daugter loves it and is using five times a week. She does not need to go out of the home now.
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for the Money
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup. Runs great. Everything I wanted. Very sturdy as I exceed the weight rating and it handles me jogging just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: For the price it is not bad, it is a bit loud and you cannot track mileage. The speed increases by 0.5 mph increments so is harder to adjust than other brands such as Proform.
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: The just right treadmill!
customer_reviews.text: My new treadmill does the trick. I can fall out of bed into and quick bit of light walking or a little swifter pace. Has ll the settings you need and is very protective with its safety features. The cat was very grateful! haha. If I feel like stopping I have options to do this and the speeds are all I need. Important to remember it won't work well with anyone over 250... Good to pay mind to this. Didn't need that point here. The nice part too is that if desired I can be placed out of the way. Really good point.
customer_reviews.author: Louisa A. Overstreet

customer_reviews.title: It's Ok
customer_reviews.text: Good for personal use, dont think I would recommend for heavy use by multiple people. Took several tries to get belt tension right. Directions were not very clear. Had some trouble with assembly but now that it is together it is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Bayless

customer_reviews.title: Treadmill review
customer_reviews.text: This is a very basic treadmill. So don't expect a lot of bells and whistles. It is easy to set-up and easy to use. It works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Snyder

customer_reviews.title: love my treadmill  thank you for a wonderful  product and the service you give is the best
customer_reviews.text: thank you for the service and a great treadmill I love it and will recommend it to anyone who is looking for one. again thank you for providing a great way to shop. Virginia
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Bridge

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy basic treadmill.
customer_reviews.text: A bit tough to assemble and basic controls/options but a good starter model. Sturdy and smooth for the money yea
customer_reviews.author: Elyse Germack

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: My belt has a cut in it. No telling how long now before I can use the treadmill.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne C Watson

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, not too large and doesn't take up alot of space. Overall great treadmill with enough features for my home use. Very good investment
customer_reviews.author: Melodi Pomeroy

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly difficult to put together but it's a great treadmill once you give up on trying to get ...
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly difficult to put together but it's a great treadmill once you give up on trying to get all the bolts in the right holes which don't line up.
customer_reviews.author: Collin Ayer

customer_reviews.title: Exercise without leaving home
customer_reviews.text: I have waited years to have a treadmill in my home. Now I am able to exercise everyday and still have the luxuries of my home accessible to me. I am able to shower or simply just rest without being miles from home or in a gym some where. I also have all of my diet needs as I workout daily. I can eat and work out or workout then eat and not have to wait in order to feel balanced.
customer_reviews.author: polo2010

customer_reviews.title: Rip Off
customer_reviews.text: It worked ok for about 6 months then it would suddenly stop. Yes! while I was using it. I was going about 3 mph and it suddenly would stop. After I got hurt I had to quit using it. Don't take the risk, it's not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Christina A. Paschall

customer_reviews.title: My wife is happy!
customer_reviews.text: Rapid shipment, easy assembly, works just fine! We ordered it on a Thursday, it was waiting for us when we got home Tuesday. Took us about an hour to assemble. Simple to program, a great treadmill for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell E. Hagler

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THE TREADMILL
customer_reviews.text: IT WAS EASY TO SET UP AND GET STARTED WALKING. LOVED TO GET ON IT EACH MORNING AND WATCH MY FAVORITE TV PROGRAM AS IT IS NICE AND QUITE.
customer_reviews.author: Rjv

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: this treadmill is all that I expected for the price. Very easy to assemble in a short time. would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: victoria velasquez

customer_reviews.title: Speed 0.5 increments not 0.1
customer_reviews.text: It was advertised that the speed was 0.1 increments, but it only does 0.5 increments. Other than that I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: otis fuller

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Great machine for the money...doesn't have all the bells and whistles the fitness sites have but it gits er done!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda L. Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Review on Merit Fitness 715T Plus Treadmill rated 5 stars.
customer_reviews.text: every thing I expected . I would tell every one about it. would recoment the Merit Fitness 715T Plus Treadmill to anyone wanting a treadmill.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Looney

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Treadmill functions fine, but one of the end caps did not line up with the screw holes on assembly and had to be left off. Otherwise a decent treadmill for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and stores easily in a small space
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying this treadmill very much. Easy to use and stores easily in a small space.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I have had my treadmill for a few weeks now and it fits perfectly in a small space. Perfect for anyone wanting to get into shape without becoming a fitness freak.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! The footbed, is a wee bit short for my stride, so I have to be careful not to step off the back. Runs well.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Abernathy

customer_reviews.title: False description
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this treadmill one of the reasons was because the description of the product states that this has a manuel incline which after searching in the owners manuel and the internet I found out it was not this model. I am very upset it runs great but I really need that additional incline for my workout. I would have paid 50-100 dollars more for one that did has this feature.
customer_reviews.author: Liza

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the price. Not a whole lot of assembly. I can run on it everyday and it works like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Helvaty

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job
customer_reviews.text: We have it for last three weeks. It took 1 hour to assemble. Kind of heavy but expected it. Overall it works and we are happy for the price we paid for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Good product

customer_reviews.title: treadmill
customer_reviews.text: The treadmill arrived late.The bars were bent so trying to put this thing together was a nightmare.The bars lean to the right so I can't fold up the treadmill.I really needed a treadmill that folded because I don't have alot of room.This was the only one that I could afford that had this feature.It works great I have no complaints about that so I decided to keep my lopsided treadmill.
customer_reviews.author: teresa

customer_reviews.title: months later still love this machine
customer_reviews.text: I am an avid runner. I run my dogs every day. I live in PC Utah and we are known for our trails. I got this machine as a backup. It does not have bells and whistles, but I just ran for 20 Min at 5.5 and broke a sweat and it seamed very firm. My husband put it together without instructions in about an hour. I will confirm my endorsement of this product in a month. So far it meets and exceeds my expectations by far.
customer_reviews.author: Lorrie Niessen

customer_reviews.title: Was an upgrade for an old machine.
customer_reviews.text: More up to date features and bigger platform. Nothing real exciting. You still have get up and use it for it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tool to exercise at home while taking care of your children. Easy to assembly and you can set to your own goals.
customer_reviews.author: Tatis

product_meta.title: Merit Fitness 715T Plus Treadmill
product_meta.description:
HTM0778-01 Features: -Foldable, durable all-metal frame with space-saving design.-Great choice for both walkers and joggers, offers that keeps your stride smooth and steady at any pace.-Very low motor and belt noise, this treadmill allows you to keep the TV at a comfortable volume.-Offers four fitness programs, including weight loss, rolling hills, intervals and manual, all supported by the Aerosoft cushioning system.-Burn calories at any speed or resistance.-4 Preset programs, including weight loss, intervals, rolling hills and manual.-User capacity: 250 lbs.-Speed range of 1.0 to 10.0 miles per hour (0.1 Mph increments).-Manual 3-position incline range of 0 to 5%. Includes: -Computer console, includes three LED windows that track your resistance level, speed, time, and distance. Specifications: -Motor: 1.50 Continuous-duty hp motor (2.50 THP) keeps treadmill smooth and steady at any pace. Dimensions: -Running area: 18'' x 47'' with aerosoft cushioning.-Overall dimensions: 56'' H x 31'' W x 64'' D, 132 lbs. Warranty: -Features include a thumb pulse heart rate monitor, a space-saving foldable design and a lifetime frame and 1-year motor warranty.-Warranty is eligible for home use only.-Warranty: Lifetime frame, 1-year motor, 90-days parts and labor.

AMAZON.COM
The Merit 715T Plus treadmill make it easy to start an in-home workout program that fits your needs and fitness level. The 715T Plus is outfitted with a top-quality 2.5 THP (1.5 CHP) drive motor that provides smooth power at all speeds, so even heavier walkers can enjoy a steady belt motion underfoot. The treadmill's intuitive console controls, meanwhile, let you easily set your workout pace, from 0 to 10 miles per hour. And it's a breeze to monitor your workout progress thanks to the three-window LED display, which tracks your time, distance, speed, calories burned, and more. 

The 715T also offers a spacious 18-by-47-inch workout area that provides plenty of walking or running room, along with an Aerosoft cushioning system below the belt that isolates your feet and legs from shock. Other details include four preset programs, a three-position manual elevation adjustment (from 0 to 5 percent), a thumb pulse monitor, and a folding frame for easy storage. The 715T boasts a capacity of 250 pounds and carries a lifetime warranty on the frame and a one-year warranty on the motor.

 

Specifications:  * Workout area: 18 x 47 inches 
 * Built-in fan: No 
 * Roller dimension: 42mm 
 * Incline: 0 to 5 percent (manual) 
 * Horsepower: 2.25 THP (1.5 CHP) 
 * Frame: Steel 
 * Capacity: 250 pounds 
 * Folded dimensions: 29 by 56 by 26.25 inches (W x H x D) 
 * Expanded dimensions: 29 by 52 by 61 inches (W x H x D) 
 * Warranties: Lifetime on the frame, 1 year on the motor, 90 days on parts and labor 

About Merit Fitness
Merit Fitness is dedicated to building high-quality exercise equipment that fits your lifestyle. Each Merit treadmill, elliptical trainer, and stationary bike is built to last, with an attractive design that's been rigorously tested to hold up to heavy use. Each key component also comes from one of Merit's own facilities, giving the company complete control over how they're designed and built. If Merit doesn't make the part, it thoroughly audits who does, ensuring that all the parts work together. Merit Fitness is a division of Johnson Health Tech, one of the largest fitness equipment manufacturers in the world. Merit Fitness is headquartered in Cottage Grove, Wisconsin.
feature_bullets: Home treadmill with top-quality 2.5 THP (1.5 CHP) drive motor
Intuitive console controls with adjustable speed from 0 to 10 miles per hour
3-window LED display tracks your time, speed, distance, calories, and more
Spacious 18-by-47-inch workout area with Aerosoft cushioning system
Folding frame for easy storage; measures 29 x 52 x 61 inches (W x H x D)
